concept.title: Configuration, specialization, generalization, and constraints
concept.shortdesc: The extension facilities of DITA allow existing vocabulary and constraint modules to be combined to create specific DITA document types. Vocabulary modules also can be specialized to meet requirements that are not satisfied by existing markup.
